tagline: Edit, preview and export Markdown with live rendering and comprehensive statistics
pageDescription: Professional Markdown editor with split-view preview, GitHub Flavored Markdown support, export to multiple formats (HTML, PDF, MD), statistics dashboard, templates library, and auto-save. All processing happens in your browser - secure and fast.

instructions.title: How to use the Markdown Preview & Editor

steps.title: Write or import Markdown
steps.description: Start typing in the editor pane or import an existing .md file using the Import button. The tool auto-saves your work to localStorage.

steps.title: Preview in real-time
steps.description: See your formatted content instantly in the preview pane. Switch between split view, editor-only, or preview-only modes using the toolbar buttons.

steps.title: Use templates
steps.description: Quickly start with ready-made templates for README, blog posts, documentation, meeting notes, task lists, and changelogs.

steps.title: View statistics
steps.description: Click the stats button to see word count, character count, reading time, headings count, links, images, and more.

steps.title: Export your work
steps.description: Download your content as Markdown (.md), styled HTML, or PDF. HTML export includes theme styling for immediate use.

features: GitHub Flavored Markdown (GFM) support with tables, task lists, and strikethrough
Live split-view preview with synchronized editing
Export to Markdown, HTML (with theme), and PDF formats
Comprehensive statistics: words, characters, lines, reading time, headings, links, images
Template library: README, blog post, documentation, meeting notes, task list, changelog
Auto-save to localStorage - never lose your work
useCases: Writing README files for GitHub repositories
Creating blog posts and articles in Markdown
Drafting technical documentation with code blocks and tables
Taking meeting notes with formatted sections
Previewing Markdown before committing to Git
Converting Markdown to PDF for sharing
proTips: Use Ctrl+B for bold, Ctrl+I for italic, and Ctrl+K for links (in most browsers)
The editor auto-saves every second - your work is safe even if you close the tab
Click the stats icon to see detailed analytics including reading time estimation
Switch to dark theme for comfortable night-time writing
Export to HTML with theme included for immediate use in websites
Use templates as starting points and customize them to your needs
troubleshooting: Preview not updating? Make sure you're typing in the editor pane - the preview updates automatically
Lost your work? Check if auto-save is working - it saves to localStorage every second
PDF export looks wrong? Make sure the preview is fully rendered before exporting
HTML export missing styles? Ensure 'Include CSS' option is enabled
Import not working? Only .md, .markdown, and .txt files are supported
